title: Fix ambient sound playback and adjust timer/quote layout spacing

requirements.text: Debug and fix the ambient sound player in frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientSound.ts so that all sounds (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi beats) successfully play audio when the play button is clicked, ensuring proper Audio element initialization, source loading, and playback execution

quotes: no even one sound is playable wht is wrong with ur coding

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking play on any ambient sound (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi beats) successfully plays the corresponding audio
Audio playback continues until paused by the user
Volume slider correctly adjusts the audio output level
No console errors related to audio playback

requirements.text: Adjust the vertical positioning in frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx so the timer is moved down slightly from its current position while remaining horizontally centered
acceptanceCriteria: Timer display is positioned lower on the screen than its current location
Vertical spacing creates clear separation from the quote above

requirements.text: Ensure the motivational quote and timer display in frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx have sufficient vertical spacing between them so they are clearly separated and do not overlap or appear too close together

quotes: quote and timer shouldnt overlappp to each other it should be visible diiff ly

acceptanceCriteria: Quote and timer have clear visual separation with adequate vertical spacing
No overlapping occurs between quote text and timer display
Both elements remain fully readable and distinct from each other

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
